# Task 8 ‚Äì Superstore Sales Performance Dashboard Design

## üìå Objective
Create a basic interactive dashboard showing sales performance by product, region, and month using Power BI.

![Superstore Sales Performance Dashboard](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/184136631/554219105-ba08af8a-5e9d-429d-ac56-febae130a548.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3NzE5NDk3MTMsIm5iZiI6MTc3MTk0OTQxMywicGF0aCI6Ii8xODQxMzY2MzEvNTU0MjE5MTA1LWJhMDhhZjhhLTVlOWQtNDI5ZC1hYzU2LWZlYmFlMTMwYTU0OC5wbmc_.hCY9JvihqVViaW_rUQ8RJqN5aUZHNNwuVd2_GHAIc7U)

## üõ†Ô∏è Tools Used
* Power BI
* superstore_sales.csv dataset

## üìä Dashboard Includes
* üìà Line Chart ‚Äì Sales Trend Over Time (Month-Year)
* üìä Bar Chart ‚Äì Sales by Region
* üç© Donut Chart ‚Äì Sales by Category
* üéõÔ∏è Interactive Region Slicer

## üìÇ Files Included
* Dashboard Screenshots
* Insights text document (3‚Äì4 key observations)

## üîç Key Insights
* Sales show an overall upward trend over time.
* Africa region generates the highest sales among selected regions.
* Technology category contributes the largest share of total sales.
* Sales distribution across categories is relatively balanced.

## ‚úÖ Outcome
Built a clean and interactive sales dashboard to summarize business performance visually.
